intro.headline: strategy driven product designer for e-commerce and software projects
text: Hello, welcome, and thank you for taking the time to review my latest portfolio. This folio includes case studies of projects I advanced and completed while working with CommentSold.

These projects were in the exciting new domain of 'Livestreaming E-commerce' which involves integration with social media platforms, patterns of e-commerce, and design for web apps and native mobile applications.

dcl.thumbAlt: Dashboard design for the Decoupled Live project

snippets.1: about this portfolio // This portfolio showcases selected work from my time with CommentSold, applying my skills in Product Design and User Experience. I live with my family in Atlanta, Georgia but I am from Ireland. artisan lead strategy product technical
snippets.2: The case studies showcase product design for livestream e-commerce is an exciting domain for a product designer to work in.
